img_summary: This image depicts **The Spirit of Captain Void-Illusion**, an epic key item in *Black Myth: Wukong*. It is part of a series of unique "clusters of will" that cannot be cultivated but hold significant narrative and gameplay importance. The item is likely obtained by defeating Captain Void-Illusion, similar to other Captain Spirits mentioned in the context. It can be combined with **The Spirit of Captain Lotus-Vision**, **Wise-Voice**, and **Kalpa-Wave** to interact with the prisoner in the first cell at the base of the Pagoda Realm in *The New West*.
